# UITextInputTextColorKey

**Global Variable**

The color of the text.

## Declaration

```swift
let UITextInputTextColorKey: String
```

## Discussion

The value of this key is a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIColor] object.

## Constants

- **UITextInputTextBackgroundColorKey**: The background color of the text.
- **UITextInputTextFontKey**: The font of the text.

items.description: The background color of the text.
